## NgxPrimerAccordionRootComponent.accordionConfig property

Provides the configuration for the accordion component by injecting the `AccordionConfig` service.

The `accordionConfig` property allows access to customizable settings and configurations for the accordion, such as default behaviors, styles, or other shared properties. These configurations can be tailored globally or overridden at specific component levels.

\#\#\# Purpose - Centralizes the configuration for the accordion component. - Promotes consistency and reusability across multiple accordion instances. - Allows for easy updates and modifications to default settings.


 {<!-- -->NgxPrimerAccordionConfig<!-- -->}

**Signature:**

```typescript
readonly accordionConfig: import("../../configs/accordion-config").NgxPrimerAccordionConfig;
```
